name: @debrief/shared-types
description: Shared types for Debrief ecosystem with constrained GeoJSON FeatureCollections

scripts.clean: rm -rf derived/ dist/* python-src/debrief/types/[!R]*.py python-src/debrief/schemas/*.json build/ *.egg-info/
scripts.clean:smart: [ ! -f derived/typescript/featurecollection.ts ] || find schemas -newer derived/typescript/featurecollection.ts -print -quit | grep -q . && pnpm clean || echo 'Skipping clean - no schema changes detected'
scripts.generate:ts: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 mkdir -p derived/typescript && (cd schemas/features && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript FeatureCollection.schema.json > ../../derived/typescript/featurecollection.ts) && (cd schemas/states && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript TimeState.schema.json > ../../derived/typescript/timestate.ts && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript ViewportState.schema.json > ../../derived/typescript/viewportstate.ts && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript SelectionState.schema.json > ../../derived/typescript/selectionstate.ts && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript EditorState.schema.json > ../../derived/typescript/editorstate.ts && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript CurrentState.schema.json > ../../derived/typescript/currentstate.ts) && pnpm generate:ts:post-process
scripts.generate:python: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 mkdir -p derived/python && (NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype schemas/features/Track.schema.json -o derived/python/track.py --lang python --top-level TrackFeature & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype schemas/features/Point.schema.json -o derived/python/point.py --lang python --top-level PointFeature & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype schemas/features/Annotation.schema.json -o derived/python/annotation.py --lang python --top-level AnnotationFeature & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype schemas/features/FeatureCollection.schema.json -o derived/python/featurecollection.py --lang python --top-level DebriefFeatureCollection & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype schemas/states/TimeState.schema.json -o derived/python/TimeState.py --lang python --top-level TimeState & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype schemas/states/ViewportState.schema.json -o derived/python/ViewportState.py --lang python --top-level ViewportState & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype schemas/states/SelectionState.schema.json -o derived/python/SelectionState.py --lang python --top-level SelectionState & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype schemas/states/EditorState.schema.json -o derived/python/EditorState.py --lang python --top-level EditorState & wait)
scripts.build:python-wheel:optional: python -m build --wheel --outdir dist/python/ || echo '⚠️ Python wheel build skipped (missing dependencies)'
scripts.build:dist: pnpm generate:types && mkdir -p dist && pnpm compile:ts
scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm build:dist && pnpm build:python-wheel
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npx nodemon --watch schemas --ext 'json' --exec 'pnpm generate:types'" "npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.test: pnpm test:generated && pnpm test:validators && pnpm test:schemas
scripts.validate: pnpm build && pnpm test && pnpm lint

author: Debrief Team
